attributes.action: allow people who own a pub, club, venue to chose if they allow smoking and provide notices for people before they enter
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that it should be down to the owner of a premises to allow smoking or non-smoking or allow a room to be arranged with ventilation to allow smokers to smoke indoors.  Placing notices up for people to know before they enter should suffice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
